mapper.select:
select i.amount as amount , i.amount_flag as amountFlag , m.voucher_use as voucherUse from tb_voucher_manager as v join tb_voucher_item as i on v.no = i.voucher_no join tb_account as a on a.no = i.account_no join tb_voucher_system_mapping m on m.voucher_no = v.no left join (select no, name from tb_customer union select no, name from tb_salescustomer union select no, name from tb_purchasecustomer union select code as no, name from tb_bank ) as cu on cu.no = m.customer_no where v.use_yn = 1 and i.use_yn = 1 and m.use_yn = 1 and i.order_no = m.order_no and m.closing_yn = 'y'
and account_no = #{accountNo }
and (case char_length(cu.no) when"07" then (cu.no like '${customerNo }') when "11" then (cu.no like '%${customerNo }%') end)
and date_format(v.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = concat(#{regDate },'-01')

select count(*) from tb_voucher_manager as v join tb_voucher_item as i on v.no = i.voucher_no join tb_account as a on a.no = i.account_no join tb_voucher_system_mapping m on m.voucher_no = v.no left join (select no, name from tb_customer union select no, name from tb_salescustomer union select no, name from tb_purchasecustomer union select code as no, name from tb_bank ) as cu on cu.no = m.customer_no where v.use_yn = 1 and i.use_yn = 1 and m.use_yn = 1 and i.order_no = m.order_no and m.closing_yn = 'y'
and account_no = #{accountNo }
and (case char_length(cu.no) when"07" then (cu.no like '${customerNo }') when "11" then (cu.no like '%${customerNo }%') end)
and date_format(v.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = concat(#{regDate },'-01')

select a.no as account_no , a.name as account_name , i.amount as amount , i.amount_flag as amount_flag , m.customer_no as customerNo from tb_voucher_manager as v join tb_voucher_item as i on v.no = i.voucher_no join tb_account as a on a.no = i.account_no join tb_voucher_system_mapping m on m.voucher_no = v.no where v.reg_date = #{startDate } and v.use_yn = 1 and i.use_yn = 1 and i.order_no = m.order_no and m.closing_yn = 'y'
